Also check out my graphic work

MATTEO

×

MATTEO is a manufacturing company based in Los Angeles. The company imports textiles from all over the world to produce a variety of sewn products, primarily focused on garment dyed bedding products. MATTEO offers their products through web purchases, showroon and other seller such as GILT and abc. During my time there, I absorbed as much of the company culture as I possibly could, to produce both web & print graphics and layouts in order promote and best represent the company.
